title: Hour 2: Thursday Thunder
description:
Stugotz is having a gambling year for the ages but won't help us on Thursday Thunder. Does Witty look more like a cop or like Billy today? Then, Matthew Perry taking out Keanu Reeves leads us to a conversation on celebrity Q-Ratings. Plus, Chris Mannix joins us for a trip around the top NBA storylines.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
